title: Problem entering champion selct
body: When i enter champion select sometimes my client freezes and then returns to the client homepage. im in champ selcct, people i have queued with have seen me in the champ select and the music is playing, but i am still at the home page, able to shop and view my profile, but im in champ select. this has happened to me 3 times now, twice in normals and once in ranked. this is getting ridiculous as im losing lp for "dodging" games when i cant even pick a champion and im getting "dodges" put onto my account so that if it happens too many times in a row i will start to be getting banned. is anyone else finding this is happening. Riot please fix this, its ridiculous.

replies.body: What have you tried to resolve it? Have you reinstalled the client?

not yet, last time i tried to reinstall the client i had to factory reset my computer, so im not too keen on trying that again. to fix it in client ive tried logging out, that worked in the ranked game, it warned me i shouldnt leave and took me to champ select
Try repairing the client then. Go to your installed programs through the control panel and repair it from there
